mapper.select: SELECT * FROM class where gymNo=#{gymNo} and gymMasterCk ='1'
SELECT c.*, t.trainername FROM class c left join trainer t on c.trainerno = t.trainerno where c.gymNo=#{gymNo} and c.gymMasterCk ='1' and c.classDate=#{classDate} order by c.CLASSSTARTTIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class (classNo, gymNo, gymMasterCk, trainerNo, className, classDate, classStarttime, classEndtime, classMaximum, classJoin, classFullbooked, sportsType, sportsClasstype) VALUES (Class_seq.NEXTVAL, #{gymNo}, '1', #{trainerNo}, #{className}, TO_DATE(#{classDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{classStarttime}, #{classEndtime}, #{classMaximum}, 0, '0', #{sportsType}, #{sportsClasstype})
